title: Data and Code for: "Artificial intelligence, algorithmic pricing and collusion"
creator: Emilio Calvano
description:
This material provides the codes, the executables and the
scripts for the simulations in the paper “Artificial intelligence, algorithmic
pricing and collusion,” by Emilio Calvano, Giacomo Calzolari, Vincenzo Denicolò,
Sergio Pastorello.
subject: Artificial Intelligence
Pricing-Algorithms
Collusion
Reinforcement Learning
Q-Learning
D43 Market Structure, Pricing, and Design: Oligopoly and Other Forms of Market Imperfection
D83 Search; Learning; Information and Knowledge; Communication; Belief; Unawareness
L13 Oligopoly and Other Imperfect Markets
L41 Monopolization; Horizontal Anticompetitive Practices
